nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'IRFGRP' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'IRFGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'IRFGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'IRFGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'IRFGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'IRFGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'IRFGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers_surface_value
nml_option.description: if true, surface value is computed for 'IRFGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_IRFTracers_sea_ice_coupling
nml_option.description: if true, couple IRF fields with sea ice

package.name: IRFTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include IRFGRP.

package.name: IRFTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the IRF tracer group.

package.name: IRFTracersSurfaceRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the IRF tracer group.

package.name: IRFTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the IRF tracer group.

package.name: IRFTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the IRF tracer group.

package.name: IRFTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the IRF tracer group.

package.name: IRFTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the IRF tracer group.

package.name: IRFTracerBudgetPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute IRF tracer budget
